M

main(String[]) - Static method in class controller.SchemaRunner
The main method serves as the entry point of the application.
model - package model
The model package contains the core data structures and logic for representing and managing database schemas.
model.exception - package model.exception
The model.exception package contains custom exceptions used for error handling within the schema parsing and processing framework.
model.factory - package model.factory
The model.factory package contains factory classes responsible for creating instances of generators and parsers used in schema processing.
model.generator - package model.generator
The model.generator package contains classes and interfaces for generating SQL scripts from schema models.
model.parser - package model.parser
The model.parser package contains classes and interfaces for parsing schema files and converting them into SchemaModel objects.

Constructs a SchemaController with the specified model and view.

Interface for schema generators that produce SQL scripts based on schema models.
SchemaModel - Class in model
The SchemaModel class represents the data model for a database schema.
SchemaModel() - Constructor for class model.SchemaModel
Constructs an instance of SchemaModel with an empty table list.
SchemaParser - Interface in model.parser
The SchemaParser interface defines the contract for parsing schema files into a SchemaModel.
SchemaParsingException - Exception in model.exception
The SchemaParsingException class represents a custom exception that is thrown when an error occurs during the parsing of a schema file.

Constructs a new SchemaParsingException with the specified detail message.
SchemaParsingException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception model.exception.SchemaParsingException
